page.title: 14ECOLOGY OF EAST MONKLANDS 2
page.content: THIS IS RETURNED ONLY ON SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF RESTORATION WORK. HOWEVER, FOR MOST OF THE IMPROVEMENTS TO THE ENVIRONMENT, THE DISTRICT COUNCIL HAS HAD TO RELY ON THE DIRECT FUNDING OF SCHEMES BY THE {SCOTTISH {DEVELOPMENT AGENCY.}UNFORTUNATELY, SINCE 1981, THERE HAS BEEN A REDUCTION IN THE AVAILABILITY OF S.D.A. FINANCE. HOWEVER, THE DISTRICT COUNCIL CONTINUES TO MAKE LIMITED FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTIONS TO CERTAIN LAND RENEWAL PROJECTS AND ENCOURAGES REHABILITATION SCHEMES AND AID FROM THE COUNTRYSIDE COMMISSION AND FORESTRY COMMISSION,ETC.
